channel.title: [PI] Need help with project-insanity [PI]
channel.description:
So this is my kinda like idea :P I've searched all over the internet and didn't find an answer: How can I make a, kinda like a dialogue thingy so it would be like:
*starts at tutorial island*
Tutor: Welcome to -SERVERNAME- etc. Player: Nice, tell me more about this place. Tutor: (then the tutor would tell some stuff) Tutor: (then the tutor would tell some stuff) Tutor: Get ready to go to the Mainland...
*teleports*
It would be kinda like a beginning tutorial Help plox?? Would appreciate it ;D ;D ;D :D :D :cool:
